title: President Donald J. Trump’s Africa Strategy Advances Prosperity, Security, and Stability – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
December 13, 2018
We hope to extend our economic partnerships with countries who are committed to self-reliance and to fostering opportunities for job creation in both Africa and the United States.
						President Donald J. Trump					PROMOTING PROSPERITY IN AFRICA AND AMERICA: President Donald J. Trump is releasing a Strategy toward Africa that will advance American and African prosperity.STRENGTHENING SECURITY: President Trump’s Africa Strategy supports efforts to counter threats to American and African security.  STRIVING FOR STABILITY: The President’s Strategy prioritizes United States foreign assistance that supports progress toward stability, good governance, and self-reliance.
